sunlight: Full sun only if soil kept moist
description: Boxwood (Buxus microphylla 'Compacta') is an amazing evergreen shrub. It is small and densely packed to give its compact silhouette and bushy look. It's dark green leaves make it the perfect small hedging plant for a formal garden style. But it does even more than just provide an elegant look. Its small leaves make it resilient enough to resist a majority of common varieties of pests, as well as having a natural resilience to frost damage. Its low maintenance and hardiness make it a perfect choice for areas with cold winters and poor soils.
